backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact messages with validation and functions to submit and query them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing scene-related feature tasks, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend source file.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment guide outlining backend deploy, frontend build, runtime flow, and diagnostic formats.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file containing the app mount point and script tag for the frontend entrypoint.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Instructions for embedding the static 3D cafe build into WordPress Elementor with deployment notes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing the 3D scene, navigation bar, overlay panels, and viewport tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Reusable styled frame component applying contour texture and visual container effects.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Generic overlay panel wrapper with a header, close button, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button with tooltip that triggers the onboarding overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with logo and buttons that open about, contact, and menu panels.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: A dialog overlay showing onboarding instructions for navigating the 3D cafe with tips and a start button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppViewport.ts: Sets a CSS variable for viewport height to stabilize layout on mobile browsers and listens for viewport changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Tracks whether the user is visiting for the first time using localStorage and provides functions to dismiss onboarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, identity loading, status tracking, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages with runtime checks and diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines the app’s Tailwind base styles and a warm café-themed color palette with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: Displays an About panel with cafe description, values, and visit information inside a sliding sheet.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Implements a contact form with submission handling, validation, and backend integration within a sheet panel.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Provides a downloadable WordPress static package with instructions and notes about feature limitations.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Shows a tabbed menu of coffee, pastries, and desserts and supports navigation to other panels.
frontend/src/scene/assets/LocalGltfModel: Loads and clones local GLTF/GLB models with Suspense support and flexible transform props.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Renders the base 3D cafe scene with basic lighting, navigation hooks, and readiness/error callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeCharac: Aggregates cafe character components, currently only rendering dogs.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeDogs.t: Places several static dog models around the cafe using DogModel with fixed positions, rotations, and scales.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeHumans: Places three static human models in the cafe using HumanModel at predefined positions and orientations.
frontend/src/scene/characters/characterM: Empty placeholder file for character material definitions.
frontend/src/scene/characters/DogCharact: Defines a static primitive dog mesh used as a legacy or fallback model with configurable position, rotation, color, and scale.
frontend/src/scene/characters/DogModel.t: Loads a static dog GLB model with LocalGltfModel and provides a simplified primitive dog fallback.
frontend/src/scene/characters/HumanChara: Defines a static primitive human mesh used as a legacy or fallback model with optional seated posture.
frontend/src/scene/characters/HumanModel: Loads a static human GLB model with LocalGltfModel and includes a basic primitive fallback mesh.
frontend/src/scene/components/MenuBoardF: Creates a neon emissive outline mesh around a rectangular frame using custom ShapeGeometry.
frontend/src/scene/components/WallFrameL: Generates a high‑resolution canvas texture containing text and displays it on a plane as a 3D wall label.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Implements first‑person cafe navigation with keyboard movement, mouse/touch look controls, and pointer lock support.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Renders a minimal fallback café scene with basic walls, floor, lighting, primitive furniture, labels, and contour overlays to ensure guaranteed geometry display.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Defines the full café environment with physics-backed floor, contour-textured surfaces, wall textures, model-based furniture, scene dressing, and mount diagnostics.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Provides Counter, CafeTable, WoodenChair, and BarStool components using contour-textured materials and model-based or primitive geometry.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds decorative café props including the espresso machine, grinder, pastry case, and menu board with neon glow and large label text.
frontend/src/scene/environment/Commercia: Implements a detailed commercial espresso machine model with metal materials, group heads, wands, and tray.
frontend/src/scene/environment/Furniture: Defines primitive TableModel and ChairModel components as GLB-free fallbacks for reliable rendering.
frontend/src/scene/HomeCafeCanvas.tsx: Sets up the Three.js canvas with loading and error overlays, WebGL checks, and mounting of the CafeScene.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useContourTextu: Loads and configures contour textures, producing floor, wall, and furniture variants with repeat settings and enhanced filtering.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: Loads a Three.js texture asynchronously with error logging and optional callback, returning undefined on failure.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Sets a timeout to detect stalled scene startup and triggers a callback unless canceled on successful render.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useWallMapTextu: Loads a specific wall texture and applies wrapping, filtering, and anisotropy settings.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Animates a door opening or closing based on camera proximity using smooth rotation interpolation.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Provides a draggable prop that rotates during inspection and displays an on-screen hint.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Renders interactive floating props (card, cup, sign) with hover/press feedback and click handling.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Displays rotating POI markers with hover and dwell activation logic linked to camera direction.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Defines a list of POIs with positions, labels, and associated actions.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Detects when the camera enters defined zones and shows UI prompting actions like opening panels.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Creates various reusable materials including contour overlays, wood, metal, and standard highlight colors.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: A React error boundary that captures scene errors, increments error counts, and resets on retry.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: Shows a UI overlay when the scene loads in degraded mode with a retry option.
Displays an error overlay for failed scene loads with optional diagnostic details and retry button.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: React loading overlay that shows a spinner and, after 8 seconds, a degraded-mode retry panel.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Utilities for logging scene load failures and successes with labeled diagnostic stages.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL availability and required extensions, returning support status and reason.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store managing which UI panel is currently active.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines motion timing, easing, and spring presets plus a helper to build transition strings.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Centralized design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Logs deployment-related errors with context, step labeling, and remediation hints.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme tokens, colors, fonts, radii, and enabling extra plugins.
frontend/THIRD_PARTY_MODEL_ATTRIBUTION.m: Documentation listing all third‑party 3D models, sources, licenses, and required local file locations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing scene features, issues, and active fix requests.
